topics.body:
*WHAT IN THE EVER FLYING FUCK?!*

Apparently KLab America, the company in charge of the translated version of Love Live! censored the homosexuality from the games and tried to bullshit their way out of it by blaming it on japanese culture.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5563d5a06368724cf0e80e00#post_5563d5a06368724cf0e80e00
Gay

For those who missed last night. There's some concept art of DC superheroes that reimagines them as characters from classic japanese entertainment. (Superman is a giant robot, Batman and robin are Gatchaman, Aquaman is Ultraman, Wonder woman is captain harlock, Green lantern is Cobra, And Flash is Speed racer)

And I've been thinking of a marvel equivalent.
